name: Nmap
description: NMAP,also known as Network Mapper, is a free and open source utility for network discovery and security auditing.

name: BurpSuite
description: Burp Suite is a tool designed to support and speed up efficiency in penetration testing and CI/CD integration in DevOps with a proper reporting system.

name: Wireshark
description: Wireshark is a network packet analyzer, that captures live packet data from a network interface.

name: Metasploit
description: Metasploit is a very powerful all-in-one tool used for performing the different steps of a penetration test.
